text: 28|47|Moshi-s≈ç shinakattanaraba, kare-ra no te ga sakini nashita (okonai no) tame, kare-ra ni wa saiyaku ga osoikakarudearou. Sonotoki ni natte, kare-ra wa iudearou. `Omo yo, naze anata wa, shito o watashi-tachi ni o tsukawashi ni naranakatta no ka. Watashi-tachi wa anata no shirushi ni shitagai, shinjinbukai-sha ni natta mono o.'
